metadata.synopsis: When players try to leave House of Hope, but players are not gathered in Foyer, trigger this AD
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_DevilsFee_ReceivingPortalHoH3. oe LOW_HOH_ActivatePortal4. Ctrl+Shift+1 to create another companion5. Move companion outside the room6. Click on the portal

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You'll need everyone together before you proceed.*
